attributes.additional_details:
We ask  to have our Pagan religion,s recognised & respected & above all valued.
We are educated individuals have a valuable place with in our communities,
We offer help,spiritual& physical  healing to those who have been failed by modern day methods.
& much more besides .
Our numbers grow over 10,000 in the UK alone as the need to reconnect our selves to the natural world ,grounding &developing a sense of peace .
Is surely what religion is all about please reconsider ?
